directions: Combine watermelon, green onions, mint, parsley, and chiles in large bowl.
Whisk oil and vinegar in small bowl to blend. Pour dressing over watermelon mixture; toss to coat. Season salad generously with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons finely chopped seeded deveined jalapeño chiles
title: Watermelon, Green Onion, and Mint Salad
